item.title: How to code in the player class
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:4, topic:477789”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=595985.msg4196275#msg4196275 date=1357526781]
You’d be looking to work in the killedBy method.

Also, the current IP is a string… Comparing references is not what you want to do here.
[/quote]
Iam in the killedBy method. If not the CurrentIP then what?[/quote]I never said current IP is not what you want… I said you don’t want to compare references…

item.title: How to code in the player class
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

hey guys im looking for some help here.
problem im trying to get solved- trying to make when 2 players are online with the same ip and one kills the otherthe do not get a random drop. how would i go about doing this? this is what i have got and it does not work
if(player.getCurrentIP() != affectedPlayer.getCurrentIP())

how would i declare affectedPlayer, bc i got it like this and it does not work
Player affectedPlayer = world.getPlayer(usernameHash);

Read full topic
